alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Collier, northeastern Hendry and south central Glades Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud 8 miles west of Devils Garden, or 11 miles southwest of Montura, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Moore Haven, Montura, Devils Garden, Harlem and Lake Hicpochee. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
